arts.ttl: Parma and Atalanta looking for victory
arts.sum: Parma will play their first home game of the season, hosting Atalanta on Matchday 2 of Serie A 2025-26. The Gialloblù will want to recover after losing to Juventus, but Atalanta also only managed a draw with Pisa in their first game of the season, and will be determined to get three points on the board.
